00032 void linalg_cholesky_solve(ub::vector<double> &x, ub::matrix<double> &A, ub::vector<double> &b){
00033 
00034 #ifdef NOGSL
00035     throw std::runtime_error("linalg_cholesky_solve is not compiled-in due to disabling of GSL - recompile Votca Tools with GSL support");
00036 #else
00037     /* calling program should catch the error error code GSL_EDOM
00038      * thrown by gsl_linalg_cholesky_decomp and take
00039      * necessary steps
00040      */
00041     
00042     gsl_matrix_view m
00043         = gsl_matrix_view_array (&A(0,0), A.size1(), A.size2());
00044 
00045     gsl_vector_view gb
00046         = gsl_vector_view_array (&b(0), b.size());
00047 
00048     gsl_vector *gsl_x = gsl_vector_alloc (x.size());
00049 
00050     gsl_set_error_handler_off();
00051     int status = gsl_linalg_cholesky_decomp(&m.matrix);
00052 
00053     if( status == GSL_EDOM)
00054         throw std::runtime_error("Matrix not symmetric positive definite");
00055 
00056     
00057     gsl_linalg_cholesky_solve(&m.matrix, &gb.vector, gsl_x);
00058 
00059     for (size_t i =0 ; i < x.size(); i++)
00060         x(i) = gsl_vector_get(gsl_x, i);
00061 
00062     gsl_vector_free (gsl_x);
00063 #endif
00064 }
00065 
00066 void linalg_qrsolve(ub::vector<double> &x, ub::matrix<double> &A, ub::vector<double> &b, ub::vector<double> *residual)
00067 {
00068 #ifdef NOGSL
00069     throw std::runtime_error("linalg_qrsolve is not compiled-in due to disabling of GSL - recompile Votca Tools with GSL support");
00070 #else
00071     // check matrix for zero column
00072     int nonzero_found = 0;
00073     for(size_t j=0; j<A.size2(); j++) {
00074         nonzero_found = 0;
00075         for(size_t i=0; i<A.size1(); i++) {
00076             if(fabs(A(i,j))>0) {
00077                 nonzero_found = 1;
00078             }
00079         }
00080         if(nonzero_found==0) {
00081             throw "qrsolve_zero_column_in_matrix";
00082         }
00083     }
00084 
00085     gsl_matrix_view m
00086         = gsl_matrix_view_array (&A(0,0), A.size1(), A.size2());
00087 
00088     gsl_vector_view gb
00089         = gsl_vector_view_array (&b(0), b.size());
00090 
00091     gsl_vector *gsl_x = gsl_vector_alloc (x.size());
00092     gsl_vector *tau = gsl_vector_alloc (x.size());
00093     gsl_vector *gsl_residual = gsl_vector_alloc (b.size());
00094 
00095     gsl_linalg_QR_decomp (&m.matrix, tau);
00096 
00097     gsl_linalg_QR_lssolve (&m.matrix, tau, &gb.vector, gsl_x, gsl_residual);
00098 
00099     for (size_t i =0 ; i < x.size(); i++)
00100         x(i) = gsl_vector_get(gsl_x, i);
00101 
00102     if(residual)
00103         for (size_t i =0 ; i < residual->size(); i++)
00104             (*residual)(i) = gsl_vector_get(gsl_residual, i);
00105 
00106     gsl_vector_free (gsl_x);
00107     gsl_vector_free (tau);
00108     gsl_vector_free (gsl_residual);
00109 #endif
00110 }
00111 
00112 void linalg_constrained_qrsolve(ub::vector<double> &x, ub::matrix<double> &A, ub::vector<double> &b, ub::matrix<double> &constr)
00113 {
00114 #ifdef NOGSL
00115     throw std::runtime_error("linalg_constrained_qrsolve is not compiled-in due to disabling of GSL - recompile Votca Tools with GSL support");
00116 #else
00117     // check matrix for zero column
00118     int nonzero_found = 0;
00119     for(size_t j=0; j<A.size2(); j++) {
00120         nonzero_found = 0;
00121         for(size_t i=0; i<A.size1(); i++) {
00122             if(fabs(A(i,j))>0) {
00123                 nonzero_found = 1;
00124             }
00125         }
00126         if(nonzero_found==0) {
00127             throw std::runtime_error("constrained_qrsolve_zero_column_in_matrix");
00128         }
00129     }
00130 
00131     // Transpose constr:
00132     constr = trans(constr);
00133 
00134     const int N = b.size();
00135     const int ngrid = x.size()/2;
00136 
00137     // temporary variables
00138     ub::matrix<double> Q(2*ngrid, 2*ngrid);       // Q matrix: QR decomposition of trans(B)
00139     ub::matrix<double> Q_k(2*ngrid, 2*ngrid);
00140     ub::identity_matrix<double> I (2*ngrid);
00141     ub::vector<double> v(2*ngrid);
00142 
00143     Q = ub::zero_matrix<double>(2*ngrid, 2*ngrid);
00144     Q_k = ub::zero_matrix<double>(2*ngrid, 2*ngrid);
00145     v = ub::zero_vector<double>(2*ngrid);
00146 
00147     double *tmp = & constr(0,0);
00148     gsl_matrix_view gsl_constr
00149       = gsl_matrix_view_array (tmp, constr.size1(), constr.size2());
00150 
00151     tmp = &b(0);
00152     gsl_vector_view gsl_b
00153          = gsl_vector_view_array (tmp, b.size());
00154 
00155 
00156     gsl_vector *tau_qr = gsl_vector_alloc (ngrid);
00157 
00158     gsl_linalg_QR_decomp (&gsl_constr.matrix, tau_qr);
00159 
00160     Q = I;
00161 
00162     for (int k = ngrid; k > 0 ; k--) {
00163 
00164         for (int icout = 0; icout < k - 1; icout++) {
00165              v(icout) = 0;
00166         }
00167         v(k - 1) = 1.0;
00168 
00169         for (int icout = k; icout < 2*ngrid; icout++) {
00170              v(icout) = gsl_matrix_get(&gsl_constr.matrix, icout, k - 1 );
00171         }
00172 
00173         Q_k = I - gsl_vector_get(tau_qr, k - 1 ) * outer_prod ( v, v );
00174         Q = prec_prod(Q, Q_k);
00175 
00176     }
00177 
00178     Q = trans(Q);
00179     gsl_vector_free (tau_qr);
00180 
00181     // Calculate A * Q and store the result in A
00182     A = prec_prod(A, Q);
00183 
00184 
00185     // A = [A1 A2], so A2 is just a block of A
00186     ub::matrix<double> A2 = ub::matrix_range<ub::matrix<double> >(A,
00187             ub::range (0, N), ub::range (ngrid, 2*ngrid)
00188          );
00189 
00190     tmp = &A2(0,0);
00191     gsl_matrix_view gsl_A2
00192          = gsl_matrix_view_array (tmp, A2.size1(), A2.size2());
00193    
00194         
00195     gsl_vector *z = gsl_vector_alloc (ngrid);
00196     gsl_vector *tau_solve = gsl_vector_alloc (ngrid);  // already done!
00197     gsl_vector *residual = gsl_vector_alloc (N);
00198 
00199     gsl_linalg_QR_decomp (&gsl_A2.matrix, tau_solve);
00200     gsl_linalg_QR_lssolve (&gsl_A2.matrix, tau_solve, &gsl_b.vector, z, residual);
00201 
00202     // Next two cycles assemble vector from y (which is zero-vector) and z
00203     // (which we just got by gsl_linalg_QR_lssolve)
00204 
00205     for (int i = 0; i < ngrid; i++ ) {
00206            x[i] = 0.0;
00207     }
00208 
00209     for (int i = ngrid; i < 2 * ngrid; i++ ) {
00210            x[i] = gsl_vector_get(z, i - ngrid);
00211     }
00212 
00213     // To get the final answer this vector should be multiplied by matrix Q
00214     // TODO: here i changed the sign, check again! (victor)
00215     x = -prec_prod( Q, x );
00216 
00217     gsl_vector_free (z);
00218     gsl_vector_free (tau_solve);
00219     gsl_vector_free (residual);
00220 #endif
00221 }
